name: Transcendent Sword
effect: [Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 11000 DP or less. If you have a Digimon in play with [Omnimon] or [Greymon] (other than [DoruGreymon], [BurningGreymon], or [DexDoruGreymon]) in its name, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 15000 DP or less instead.
